description: Listen up, Trainer! After a day of rock-solid adventures, you gotta stash your loot somewhere special. That's where the /e/Crystal Chest/e/ comes in – your personal vault for all those precious minerals, pulverized gems, and maybe even a rare fossil or two.

It's not just a box; it's a treasure trove where memories of your rocky conquests are kept safe. So, after a day of mining and investigation, swing by your Crystal Chest, deposit your haul, and revel in the satisfaction of a collection that's as solid as an Onix in a steel cage match. Your Crystal Chest – where the memories of your adventures rock on!
